title: CMOH Paschim Bardham Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Ophthalmic Assistant Posts
description: Chief Medical Officer of Health (CMOH) Paschim Bardhaman has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Ophthalmic Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 12th Pass, Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the CMOH Paschim Bardham Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply before the ...
